metadata.title: Steel Dragon Jewelers Dramatic Men's Glass Eye Ring - Choose from 22 Handcrafted Animal or Fantasy Eyes in an Egyptian Inspired Stainless Steel Setting (watch videos of each ring)
features: BEFORE ORDERING PLESAE CHECK YOUR RING SIZE AT A JEWELRY COUNTER - Our rings are made to standard US sizes
EVERY RING IS MADE TO ORDER - You select the eye and the size you want - We'll then make and ship your ring, usually within 24 hours
MUSEUM QUALITY GLASS EYES measuring 14 mm (about ½ inch) in diameter - Handcrafted by glass artisans to create depth, detail and lifelike realism set in a dramatic Egyptian inspired men’s ring

A LIFETIME GUARANTEE that the eye will stay bonded to the setting with our 4-step process using a special adhesive resin - If something were to happen, send us a photo and we'll replace it or refund the full price
WHY WEAR SURGICAL STEEL? High-end steel never tarnishes, resists scratching, is almost universally hypoallergenic and will never corrode or turn your finger green
description: A DRAMATIC EGYPTIAN INSPIRED MEN’S RING FEATURES YOUR CHOICE OF 26 HANDCRAFTED ANIMAL OR FANTASY GLASS EYES

VISIT OUR AMAZON STORE and choose from 4 original ring designs, 2 pendant necklaces and 3 braceletsOur jewelry features 4 sizes of hand-crafted glass eyes, including: alligator, bear, cat, coyote, eagle, fox, leopard-panther, lion, owl, red-tailed hawk, tiger, wolf, evil eye, human brown, blue and green plus vampire, werewolf and 6 dragon glass eyes The result is a one-of-a-kind piece, made-to-order , at an affordable price and shipped within 48 hoursWe guarantee our workmanship and your satisfaction and only ask that you double check your ring size with a jeweler or at a jewelry counter before orderingEXPERIENCE WEARING ART from Steel Dragon Jewelers and let us make yours today!
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "0.98 x 0.71 x 1.18 inches; 3 Ounces", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "October 10, 2018", "Manufacturer": "Steel Dragon Jewelers"}
